New Records: Taskin Ahmed took a four-wicket haul in the match.
Bangladesh won the match by 9 runs.
Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed was on a hat-trick in the first over of his spell.
Post-Match Reflections: Taskin Ahmed expressed hope for a hat-trick but acknowledged the need for luck.
Bangladesh's fast bowlers, including Taskin and Hasan Mahmud, performed effectively.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Taskin Ahmed emphasized the importance of disciplined bowling and length balls in the match.
